name: Name
footer_description: Your partner in bridging educational gaps.
about_intro: Vidyodaya is a nonprofit platform designed to bring quality education to rural India by empowering volunteers, schools, and sponsors with the tools they need.
about_mission: To build an inclusive, scalable model that connects volunteers, donors, and educators with underserved rural schools—fostering lifelong learning.
multilingual_assistance: Content and tools in multiple regional languages
volunteer_programs: Training and mentorship programs for volunteers
resources_and_guides: Open-source lesson plans and teaching materials
partnerships: Collaborations with educational NGOs and institutions
about_team: A diverse team of educators, technologists, and volunteers united by the vision of equitable education.
about_cta: Whether you want to volunteer, sponsor a school, or spread the word—every action transforms a child’s future.
faq_subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Vidyodaya.
faq_a1: Vidyodaya is an education outreach platform aimed at connecting volunteers, donors, and schools to uplift rural communities.
faq_a2: Yes, Vidyodaya is completely free for volunteers, schools, and donors. We are a non-profit supported by grants and contributions.
faq_q3: Who can join as a volunteer?
faq_a3: Anyone with a passion for teaching—students, professionals, and retirees—can sign up and get matched with schools.
faq_q4: Can I teach in my regional language?
faq_a4: Absolutely. Our platform supports multiple regional languages to help you communicate effectively.
faq_q5: How do I sponsor a school?
faq_a5: Visit the ‘Donate’ page to view sponsorship levels and impact reports. You’ll receive regular updates on how funds are used.
contact_subtitle: We’re here to help. Reach out anytime.
